div.h3: Reviews created for galendea for sprint Gortahork 5
div.p: This gives a way to access review timelines, see revisions, see files, see comments, apply/reference key word indicators.

tr.td: FAB-5665 Paper Intake - Don\'t show Notifier if is Employee.
FAB-5423: Do locks and commitLocks only when a delete is going to be done.
FAB-5423: Removed lockEntities method from Absence side
FAB-5643 Add eligibility inherited boolean to selected leave plan
FAB-5588: Stack Trace while Adding Time to Leave Request when case is in the Deny status
FAB-5638: Refactored logic to expose method to apply a work pattern to a work calendar.
FAB-5638: Apply work pattern to work calendar on hitting Next in Intake and Add Time.
FAB-3618: Refactor Intake / Wizard Page - Multiple Absence periods to use Webpopups
FAB-5639: Display only specific absence periods instead of the whole calendar days.
FAB-5825 Change the generation of the SQL to ensure no line as more than 1000 rows
FAB-5794: Implement the same validations as in the Intake
FAB-5795: Paint the ADT fields and also the ADI when the same Absence Reason was selected.
FAB-3618: Removed comments about the popup refactor within the work calendar.
FAB-5870: Add Time - Information in the Absence Periods listviews is gone when switching between Absence Reasons
FAB-5903 A07 - F13 Party Synchronisation feature to send the Health Care Provider details (Party ID) from Absence to Claims
FAB-5928: Display diagnosis in and out the Intake.
FAB-5927: Added diagnosis and health care provider to the leave request.
